programme.title: The Gravedigger's Truth
programme.long_synopsis:
In Somalia, two young doctors are in the fight of their lives. 
As the coronavirus begins to claim its first victims, they volunteer in the capital’s only designated Covid-19 ward. Despite their bravery, people are dying because the hospital lacks vital medical equipment. 
Officially, fewer than 100 Somalis have been killed by Covid-19. But BBC Africa Eye goes to one of the city’s main cemeteries, where the gravediggers tell a different story.
